text.3: We are a stealth start-up, VC-backed and growing- we create cybersecurity solutions to manage and protect connected devices by applying machine learning techniques to network traffic. Over the last few years, we have worked hard to build a strong foundation and infrastructure- securing funding, building the right team, establishing a customer-base and creating a solid technical foundation and now we're looking to bring on an experienced fullstack developer to join us and help us in our continued growth!
text.4: Top Reasons to Work with Us
text.6: In this role, you will join our team to help build and enhance our robust, cloud-based platform. You'll collaborate with our team and work with a wide range of technologies with opportunities to learn in-depth knowledge about application development, cybersecurity, our product lines and networking.
